doc.previous: The first web browser was invented in 1990 by Sir Tim Berners Lee Berners Lee is the director of the World Wide Web Consortium W3C which oversees the Web s continued development and is also the founder of the World Wide Web Foundation His browser was called WorldWideWeb and later renamed Nexus 5
doc.after: The first commonly available web browser with a graphical user interface was Erwise The development of Erwise was initiated by Robert Cailliau
